recipe.title: Spice
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces spiced rum, preferably Sailor Jerry (www.sailorjerry.com/rum)
instructions: In cocktail shaker filled with ice, add rum, pear juice, lime juice, and simple syrup. Shake vigorously for about 6 seconds, then strain into 6-ounce cocktail glass. Top with dash bitters and a few gratings nutmeg.
